post.author: 황성규

comment.author: 최덕선
comment.content:
Correction, Yes, you can come from Britania. Now there is new traffic signal set up from this direction.
Thanks Spencer!

post.content: 장소 : 1228 Garcia st. Mississauga 905-814-6170 (최덕선 자택) (Britannia & Creditview southeast side) I would recommend you to come from CreditView since there is no traffic sign from Britania 1.See the Duval rd(new) on your right side before tthe Britania and turn to the right(east), and soon you will meet the WhiteHorn 2.At the WhiteHorn turn to the left(north), you wouldn't miss the Garcia st on your left side.
post.title: map
